means: 皱眉( frown的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: A friend that frowns is better than a smiling enemy.
sentence.Network_cn: 朋友向你皱眉胜过敌人向你微笑.

sentence.Network_en: An ancient pagoda frowns on the mountainside.
sentence.Network_cn: 一座古塔阴森森地矗立在山腰上.

sentence.Network_en: Sumner would greet us with frowns and grimaces, doing his best to express wordless disapproval.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨姆纳会冲我们皱眉，做苦脸，竭力表示他无言的反对。

PerfectNetExp.abs: A friend that frowns is better than a smiling enemy . -- Suraine ., 一个向你皱眉的朋友用于一个向你微笑的敌人 . -- 舒朗尼.
He frowns on my smoking ., 他对我的吸烟表示不悦.
And Turner ' s aides will break their frowns to laugh at you ., 这时 , 特纳的助手会松开皱着的眉头 , 冲你一笑.
The just man frowns , but never smiles with a malicious sneer ., 公正的人蹙起眉头 , 但从不会有那种恶意的微笑.

list.abs: 百度词典搜索_做 ... 做满月[ ceremony for a one-month-old baby] 做眉做眼[ frown on] 做媒[ be a matchmaker;matchmake].
口译听力组长K谈听力教程（高级）复习指导 ... gear 使适合，搭配 frown on 蹙眉不悦 cricket 板球，蟋蟀.
His parents frowned on his staying out late ., 他父母不同意他在外面呆到很晚.
皱眉纹（Frown Lines）皱眉纹可以分成垂直纹和水平纹。
抽一张牌/cut a card愁眉不展/dusky frown愁闷的面容/long face

entry.tran: (因恼怒、担心、困惑、全神贯注等而)皱眉，蹙额
entry.def: When someone frowns, their eyebrows become drawn together, because they are annoyed, worried, or puzzled, or because they are concentrating.

example.tran: 南希摇了摇头，皱着眉头。
他不安地朝她皱了皱眉。

entry.def: If something is frowned upon or is frowned on people disapprove of it.

example.ex: This practice is frowned upon as being wasteful...
example.tran: 这种行为被认为是浪费而不获认可。

example.ex: Many teachers frown on such practices.
example.tran: 许多教师不赞同这样的做法。

auth_sentence.content: The New Testament frowns on seeking proof to replace faith.
auth_sentence.res_content: The New Testament frowns on seeking proof to replace faith.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The New Testament frowns on seeking proof to replace faith.

auth_sentence.content: Then she frowns, looking down on the glowing strand.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then she frowns, looking down on the glowing strand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then she frowns, looking down on the glowing strand.

auth_sentence.content: He frowns in concentration and begins to cut.
auth_sentence.res_content: He frowns in concentration and begins to cut.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He frowns in concentration and begins to cut.
